features: 【Professional Streaming Webcam】The webcam has a built-in ring light positioned around the lens, providing soft light for your bright video streaming. Single press the touch button to change the color temperatures.Automatically adjust the contrast and brightness to perfectly fit any environment.Even if you are in a dark room.

【Zoomable Webcam with RF 360° And 5X Zoom】 Control your video calls with a remote, so even away from the desk you are still in charge. 5X digital zoom below 1080p, Disable video, mute, adjust the FOV, white balance, and more. Higher operability, practicality and fun.★Please pay attention to pull out the plastic labels on the back of the remote control before use to ensure normal work.★

【Autofocus Designed for Streaming】 Make a great first impression with fans and impress your friends with HD webcam 1080P 60FPS high video frame rate, full HD quality.Compared to many other webcams with built-in lights, the light is brighter, with softer tones and no glare.Advanced auto focus make you never have to worry about adjusting the focal length.Plug and play on Xbox one.Widely compatible with livestream software such as OBS.

【Built-in Dual Mics&Privacy Cover】 Built-in dual omnidirectional mics with noise cancellation can pick up your voice and filter out background noise automatically.The built-in privacy cover and the remote disable video allows you to enjoy safe digital web life when not in use and prevent hackers from spying on you. It is perfect to provide privacy, security, and peace of mind to individuals, groups, organizations, companies, business, and governments.

【Plug and Play Setup & Widely Compatible】 The 1080p webcam works with USB A or USB C with included Adapter. Plug and play,No additional driver required.You can directly enjoy the webcam in applications such as Skype and Zoom. Compatible with Windows XP/7/8/10/11, Mac OS 10.6, Linux 2.6.24, Chrome OS 29.0.1547 or above, Ubuntu Version 10.04 or above.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple setup and ring light works for me and awesome remote!
reviews.reviewText: Nice packaging on this webcam. It came with a remote which is extremely useful!I also have the Logitech C925-e which is my comparison point on how much I like this camera.Here are my take-aways from first week of use: - It worked as soon as I plugged it in - I needed the usb-c adapter for the cable, as that's all the MS surface had available to me, so that was crucial in setting this up- I have a very dark office with a dark background and the ring light did a good enough job to light up my face- I use this primarily for MS teams and those on the other side saw and heard me just fine (I had a coworker compare it to the logitech and the audio was just as good according to them)----- What I loved! ------What I really loved about it was the remote! I don't have to go into settings (like I do with the logitech) to adjust the zoom, focus, auto brightness or pan left and right. It does it all from the remote. I can even do the digital option for turning on the privacy function and making my video go dark.The physical features of the camera are also great: - I can adjust the ring light from dark to bright and off by turning the outside edge clockwise or counter-clockwise. - It is continuous: so you can go brighter until you get to the brightest and then it turns off as you continue to go, and goes back through that cycle as you go clockwise. It does the opposite if you co CC so that it goes from brightest to dimmer until it goes off and back through the cycle again. - It also has a physical privacy lens cover that you can switch with your finger - It clipped easily to both my monitor and my laptop screen and seems secure enough with all the options to swivel and tilt as neededAfter a week of use on MS Teams, this camera works great. I've found it very useful and working just as well as my other webcam in terms of quality for both video and audio. What makes it better for me is the use of the remote that puts all the controls at my fingertips rather than hidden in some menu within Teams that can't be adjusted unless I disconnect from my call.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comes with a remote
reviews.reviewText: This Webcam is a must have because it allows you to zoom in. It comes with the Webcam, the remote control, user manual and usb-c converter. It makes a perfect gift for anyone who loves webcams and a perfect price. It is very easy to use. It can be set up in 5 minutes. Make a great first impression with fans and impresses your friends. This HD webcam has 1080P 60FPS high video frame rate with full HD quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid little camera
reviews.reviewText: This camera is certainly an upgrade from the fairly traditional webcam I had in the sense of its features. I dare say the image quality may look a tad better, but what I really bought it for was to be able to zoom in on my face during Webex meetings and not have everyone seeing my background as my current computer system does not meet the requirements for a virtual background. Not that I like the virtual backgrounds, too wonky and I prefer the reliability of the physical screen I currently use. I was not, however, fond of the wide angle view. This little bugger takes care of that with the nifty remote (which I haven't lost yet). It also has a light, which may or may not be enough for some, but it doesn't hurt to have it if needed. You control the light "temperature" from the back of the unit (not a fan) and you can turn the light up or down in brightness by turning the actual "knob" of the light ring. You can also adjust how bright you look in the image from the remote as well as shutting off the video feed. I do really like that it has a physical shutter right on the unit when you really want to be sure no one is watching. I also appreciate that you can move it side to side and not just up and down. This is very helpful for repositioning it on my curved monitor. Because I use a dedicated headset with mic, I cannot comment as to the sound quality, but the few times I did not use the headsets, I had no complaints. I'm sure it is no worse than my last cam. I did get a deal on this so that is a plus. Is it a 5 star camera? Nah. I will give it a solid 4 stars though for meeting all my current needs while fitting my budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I am shocked and pleasantly surprised at the quality for the cost of this camera. I do sales calls on zoom so I needed to step up my game while keeping my budget pretty decent. I purchased this one in particular based on the camera quality seeming better than my laptop and price was good, especially with the coupon.First picture is from my ~2019 macbook pro. Looks like I am taking a picture on an ipod touch from 2008 or something.Second photo is with the VITADE camera. You can see the difference for yourself.I love that the light has different warmths as well as a built-in privacy shield. The remote is the icing on the cake. The zoom and move features are so helpful, and you can adjust the brightness level from the remote as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very clear view!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this camera after reading reviews. It does not disappoint. The picture is clear, the mic works great and works it with all of my video apps. I use it a lot for video calls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working completely less than one year in
reviews.reviewText: It was okay while it was functional, but the camera stopped working this morning. It worked perfectly well last night, but this morning the light flickered upon plugging it in, and then it just went out. I've restarted, I've put the cam in every USB port possible, but it just stopped working. There's no indication of a warranty or anything, so I guess i paid whatever I paid last year not to own a camera, but instead to just rent it for a year. Bad deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spendy but works great
reviews.reviewText: I have had severa web cams over the years. I was usually spending under $30. Although they worked as advertised I found they had problem. I could not zoom in on my image. I sit at a desktop with the camera about 2 feet away. They were wide angle cameras and I tended to be a small part of the frame.This camera resolves that issue with a zoomable lens. I use a Yeti microphone so I cannot comment on the mic capabilities. The ring light is easily adjusted and I can slide the privacy switch to prevent the camera from uninvited snoopers. It's more that I would have preferred to spend, but my frustration finally got the best of me. I'm happy.
